name: dream popup
author: Nandani Gupta

sections.description:
Dream Popup is a Perfect solution for any WordPress website. With a wide range of WordPress popup types, conditions, and events (From Image Popup to Countdown popup, Exit Intent to GeoTargeting) Dream Popup helps you create high converting, promotional and informative popups, increase conversion rates and boost sales while reaching your marketing goals.

SUPER EASY AND SIMPLE TO USE

In Popup Builder, we did our best to make the interface very user-friendly and intuitive for our users. All of our popup types, events, and conditions including popup design changes are separated which makes our WordPress popup plugin suitable and easy to use. Moreover, no special coding is needed to use the plugin. Just choose your preferred type of popup and create a masterpiece for your website. While developing Popup Builder we took into consideration both your time and will to create efficient and powerful WordPress popups within minutes.

KEY FEATURE

  • Easy to use
  • Overlay feature
  • Button Customization
  • Expiration feature
  • Animation
sections.faq:
How to Create Dream Popup?

To Create the Dream popup simply publish your popup and paste your shortcode to your page.

Where can I reach the documentation?

https://dreamreflectionmedia.com/

How to show Dream Popup in my page?

Just simply add Dream Popup short code in your page where you want to show the popup.

Why is different from other popup?

Yes !Nice Question. This is more easily customize then other popup plugin and you can also customize your button as well.

What do i do if i want a popupto show only on a certain page/post/etc?

Using Shortcode you can easily shows your popup on a certain page/post/etc.

Why aren’t my popups opening/working?

Contact us at team@dreamreflectionmedia.com

Something is not working. What do I do?

Contact us! Depending on your server configuration something may go wrong, please donâ€™t hesitate on contacting us, we are here to help you! Our support email is: team@dreamreflectionmedia.com

Everything works PERFECT. What do I do?

Leave us a good review ðŸ™‚

What if i want some extra feature on this plugin?

Just email us your brief feature and we will update at your request. Just email us at team@dreamreflectionmedia.com
